channel.title: Academics on Frederick Boehm's Professional Website

item.title: My presentation materials on Figshare
item.description: I’m trying to remember to post my presentation materials on figshare.com. You can find them by clicking on the figshare icon on my home page or by clicking here. Included is the poster that I presented yesterday at PolMeth XXXIV.

item.title: John Roberts's Commencement Address
item.description:
This afternoon, while listening to “All Things Considered” on Wisconsin Public Radio, I heard an excerpt from John Roberts’s recent commencement address. Here is the story from “All Things Considered”. Here is the YouTube video.
Roberts spoke at his son’s 9th grade graduation from The Cardigan Mountain School, a boarding school for boys in grades 6 to 9, on June 3, 2017.
